books.title: PHP Programming Guide
books.author: Ahmed Ali
books.preface: This book is designed to teach PHP from basics to advanced concepts. Written for developers who want to master server-side programming.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: Getting Started
chapters.summary: This chapter introduces PHP basics, installation, and your first program.

sections.content: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development. It was created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1994.
